籤詩版本二:
Don’t worry about the current illness and litigation
Treasure land and wealth are available
Just like an ape whose chains are now loose
Return to the cave
詩意: This hexagram represents the image of an ape being released from its chains. Everything is difficult before it becomes easy later.
解曰: Get rid of things. And be at ease. Come in due time. Find the right path.
籤詩故事一:
◇Xiangzi meets a guest (Han Xiangzi meets Lu Dongbin)
In the Tang Dynasty, Han Xiangzi was the grandson of Han Yu. He has a dissolute nature and is not good at studying, so he has no choice but to drink. He was called by Han Yu to study in the academy, but instead of studying well, he bullied his classmates. Later, Han Yu arranged for him to study in a monastery, but the abbot of the monastery complained that he was arrogant.
Later, Lu Dongbin came to enlighten him, and he finally became an immortal. Named Emperor Yaohua. One of the Eight Immortals. Its symbol is a hand-held flower basket.
聖意:
The house is uneasy.
Peace of mind.
Seeking wealth and great profits.
Transaction Waiting for time.
The marriage is not completed.
Liujia pray for protection.
Pedestrians arrive.
Field silkworms are abundant.


Six animals are flat.
Looking for someone to come.
The lawsuit is justified.
Migration is lucky.
Lost things are far away.
Disease is not good.
Mountain tomb is auspicious.
古人: Xiangzi meets a guest (Han Xiangzi meets Lu Dongbin)
